data.name: Astride
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST ASTRIDE


About the Game



Explore the world of Astride set in a Scandinavian-inspired environment with Nordic breeds such as the Norwegian Fjord, Norwegian Warmblood, Icelandic Horse, Northlands Horse, Norwegian Dole and many other upcoming breeds from other origins. Meet the people of Astride and learn the secret and story of the area.

Buy your very own stable and customize it to your preference. Train your horses to reach their ultimate potential in different disciplines like dressage, show jumping, cross country, and for the Icelandic Horses; gaited riding where you can compete in tölt and pace. Start from the smallest courses and advance to the greater levels of competitions. More disciplines to come!

Care for your horses and train them for the biggest competitions. Or simply just enjoy the environment while going for trail rides to explore. Experience the different personality traits of the horses and make a special connection with them.

Figure out and reveal the mysteries and secrets surrounding you, help out the townspeople and unlock new training possibilities, special tack, equipment, clothes and more.

Key Features


  • Ride together! With Astride’s multiplayer function, visit your friends, help out and ride together in the open world. Players will be able to invite friends to their own world or visit friends’ worlds. Bring your own horse or ride your friends’ horses! Work together on stable chores and horse care.

  • Horse personalities and traits - Experience all the different personalities and how they affect your horses’ behavior when riding and caring for them. Did you end up with an easily spooked horse? Give it time and reassure it, maybe it’ll settle down. Is your horse extremely energetic? Good luck trying to keep your cool.

  • Breeding and genetics - Select your horses carefully and bring forward the best offspring. Breed for genetics, personality and colors. Or all of them at once. Use your own studs, borrow from your friends or use one from the local stud farms.

  • Seasonal competing and rankings - Challenge yourself and compete through seasons and receive your seasonal rankings. A new season equals new show jumping courses, new dressage programs, new cross country tracks and so on. Prove your worth and work your way to the top of the rankings.

  • Create your perfect experience with customization! Customize your character, your first horse and create your dream stable with tons of options to choose from.

data.short_description: Explore Astride, a horse game set in a Scandinavian-inspired environment. Care for and train horses, reveal mysteries and more!
